sub_title: Customer Success Manager • Forming strong business connections with enterprise clients
summary: An experienced specialist with track record of successfully building long-term presence in emerging markets, spotting growth possibilities, and forming strong business connections with enterprise clients. Advanced expertise in prospecting, customer relationship management, sales cycle management, and sales-closing principles (SaaS, hardware, IT, online marketing). Unwavering commitment to customer service and customer success with ability to build productive relationships, resolve complex issues, and win customer loyalty. Extensive experience in daily interaction and discussions with commercial customers in United Kingdom, Central Europe and Nordic countries. Talent for conducting market research, sales, cross-selling, online presentations, client onboarding, and software deployment.

education.field_of_study: Slavic Languages, Literatures, and Linguistics, General

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for identifying ways to retain and grow the customer relationships for a team. Advocacy, support and constant reinforcement of development for business customers, jointly striving to achieve success and best results. Account management, account enrichment, quote creation and follow-up, setup. Quoting, sourcing, buying equipment as necessary and liaising with other departments for the team. Linking the sales department with other divisions such as logistics, technical team, finance, server engineers, external suppliers etc. Ensuring smooth communication with the enterprise customers, follow ups, updates, up-selling and cross-selling. Reliable documentation of information flow and sales scale in Salesforce CRM.

• Daily service for the largest enterprise clients in the UK, Western and Central Europe, cooperation with the most dynamic sales team.
• Using specialist knowledge in developing and implementing effective strategies to increase customer satisfaction and loyalty, conflict resolution, strategies to increase sales volume and scale of cooperation.
• A liaison between sales teams and other internal departments.
profile_positions.title: Customer Success Manager

profile_positions.description:
Leverage exceptional account management expertise to capitalise on new sales opportunity for driving business growth, while working with companies from Central Europe, UK, Dubai and Nordics. Optimize sales process by contacting potential prospects to present products and services. Streamline on boarding process by supplying technical expertise in preparation of relevant documents. Analyse and transmit complete image of software to ensure appropriate construction, while adhering to client’s standards and requirements. Deliver outstanding customer service by understanding real needs and supporting in best way possible to propel business success. 

• Sole employee responsible for entering Polish market; spreading brand recognition in industry. 
• Increased business agility and revenue streams by providing business and technical solutions of products.
profile_positions.title: Account Executive

profile_positions.description:
Provided engaging lectures on English based on standardised planning and curriculum. Taught English at levels A0-B1 and English for economic studies to elevate student’s comprehension skills. Assisted students’ to enhance learning process by creating effective course materials, quizzes, and educational materials as per needs. Encouraged students and educators to practise English outside of classroom via tutorials, discussion clubs, and extracurricular activities. 

• Transitioned teaching from abstract knowledge to real world application by designing lessons using communicative and task-based approach for multi-level classrooms. 
• Increased inclusivity and accessibility to knowledge via management of virtual education platform; Moodle and Pearson MyEnglishLab for homework and communication with students.
• Developed interpersonal skills and capacity to manage people with implementation of lot of creativity.
profile_positions.title: English Language Teacher

profile_positions.description:
Providing of high-quality & custom audience segments for digital advertisers and data enrichment solutions. Establishing and developing cooperation with the largest Internet portals in Poland and Central Europe, implementing a product that has a real impact on increasing revenues from online advertising.

• Data analysis, reporting, business strategy development.
• Achieving growth and achieving sales targets through effective management of technological solutions tailored to the client's needs.
• Designing and implementing a strategic sales and development plan.

OnAudience.com provides Big Data tools and services for on-line marketing on over 40 markets in Europe and North America. The company has one of the largest 3rd party data sets in the World that consist of over 27 billion user profiles.
OnAudience.com integrates data management, including DMP and Data Exchange with programmatic buying, including DSP and Mailing Exchange. It is a tailor made solution for performance marketing focused on prospecting customers and e-commerce platforms.

OnAudience.com is a part of Cloud Techologies S.A. group, one of the fastest growing companies in Europe. Since 18 May 2012, Cloud Technologies S.A. has been listed on the NewConnect market operated by the Warsaw Stock Exchange.
profile_positions.title: Sales Manager

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the preparation and implementation of work on the development of software and a mobile application, a product available on international markets. Implementation of the company's goals and vision, reporting directly to the management board throughout the project life cycle.

• Preparation and development of a plan, budget and technical creation of an interactive program for foreign language learning.
• Team leading and management of the group working on the project - monitoring work progress and supervising the team of employees involved in the project.
• Constant supervision of implementation and closing stages of the project.
• Testing.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
Generated new business by identifying new advertising and product development channels. Introduced products to competitive market via robust product development strategies; creating stream of innovative offerings to delight customers. Streamlined logistics operations in Europe and Latin America by preparing all relevant activities and strategies.

• Improved product distribution by supporting shipping and supply chain process.
• Gained in-depth research skills as well as ability to participate in negotiations, build strong cooperation between companies, and enter new markets with product.
• Team management and supervision of activities related to logistics and production.
profile_positions.title: Business Development Manager Logistics

profile_positions.description:
Ensured marketing campaign’s success by creating effective media plans and presentations. Created strong impact on audience through effective market analysis and target identification. Reported and analysed marketing progress to drive informed decision making. Maintained ongoing contact with business partners from Poland, Spain, and Latin America to accomplish growth objectives. 

• Promoted brand and reached potential customers to gain qualified leads via creation of appealing online advertising campaigns strategies. 
• Acquired profitable deals via effective price and individual conditions negotiations.
profile_positions.title: Media Planner/Buyer

profile_positions.description: Interpreting Q&A live sessions between the audience and film directors after film screenings, taking care of artists, translating materials.
profile_positions.title: Translator (Q&A sessions)

profile_positions.description:
Acquisition of key clients for proprietary real time bidding (RTB) tool (online advertising industry) in Central Europe region. Preparation of presentations, negotiations and sale of services to international clients, preparation of contracts and coordination of their implementation.

• Monitoring and analysis of campaigns results and market data regarding the segment, competition, activities and results of the services, preparation of marketing and price reports.
• Campaign management, optimization, prospect care and consulting.
• Active participation in international conferences; presentations and negotiations.

Sociomantic empowers advertisers in more than 50 markets around the world with an intelligent display platform that drives incremental sales for sustainable revenue growth. As a market leader in real-time bidding (RTB) and personalized display advertising, Sociomantic helps marketers reach new and existing customers to grow Customer Lifetime Value using today's most advanced display advertising technologies including RTB, retargeting and prospecting, real-time data management, dynamic ad personalization, custom CRM segmentation and real-time reporting. These solutions are delivered and supported with full-service local expertise from twelve offices across four continents.

Our Global Footprint:
Founded 2009 in Berlin with additional offices in Warsaw, Paris, Amsterdam, Sao Paulo,
Moscow, New York, London, Madrid, San Francisco, Chicago, Mumbai.
profile_positions.title: Account Manager

profile_positions.description:
Acquiring key customers, conducting sales presentations, consulting, negotiating and selling services, preparing contracts and coordinating their implementation, monitoring and analyzing results, market data on the segment, competition activities and service results, preparing marketing and price reports. Market research and network expansion.

• First employee responsible for entering and creating recognition in the markets of Central Europe, with particular emphasis on the Balkan countries.
• Preparation, implementation and participation in the optimization of RTB advertising campaigns for e-commerce clients.
profile_positions.title: Key Account Manager

profile_positions.description:
• SEO copywriter: projects for the SEO department, creating blogs, participation in creating content for websites, sales and marketing materials, whisper marketing, improving the website's visibility, as well as meeting the information needs of potential customers. 

• Customer Service Representative: assistance and advice given to end customers regarding the products offered by the company and advice on healthy lifestyle and nutrition. Upselling and cross selling, returns handling.

• Translator of the Bulgarian language: adapting the advertising message to the needs of the market, corrections.
profile_positions.title: SEO Copywriter / Customer Service Specialist / Bulgarian language translator

profile_positions.description: Cooperation with VIP clients, generating the highest income and requiring a personalized, individual approach and proactive advice. Financial advice, security, verification processes, benefits, complaints, orders, providing information about products / services offered by organizations. Providing solutions that fit the individualized situations and prioritizing customer needs at every stage of the cooperation process.
profile_positions.title: VIP Customer Service Representative

profile_positions.description:
Helping individual and business customers to obtain information about the organization's services, products and offerings. Processing and handling complaints, resolving disputes, answering questions, providing customers with information. Helping end-customers understand the product and answer questions about their concerns.

• Communicating with customers through various channels.
• Keeping records of customer interactions, transactions, comments, and complaints.
• Ensuring customer satisfaction and providing professional customer support and growing customer trust.
• Additional task: supporting the marketing department in creating and translating content for official communication channels.
profile_positions.title: Senior Customer Service Representative

volunteer_experiences.description: A volunteer project aimed at teaching English to staff in the tourism and hotel industry. The project was aimed at extending the qualifications of hotel employees in the city of Villavicencio and its surroundings, as well as the town of Acacias (Meta department), by preparing staff to provide high quality service to tourists from other parts of the world. The project included various levels of participants' advancement.
